name: Berserkard
description:
Berserkard is a card game where a furious berserker has to escape from a maze. 

You cannot control him directly but , using some Control Cards, you can keep him on the right track. 

But be wary because if you run out of Control Cards he won't listen to you anymore and soon he will be lost in the maze.

This is my submission for GMTK GameJam 2020, fitting the theme "Out of Control".

____________________________________________________________________________________

Developed by FrancoStanco  - https://www.instagram.com/gabryollo/

Free 3D Assets by Devil's Work.shop - https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/

Music by Kiilstofte - https://machinimasound.com/?s=battle+of+kings
